channel.title: Poetry on Aliens in the Apple
channel.description: Recent content in Poetry on Aliens in the Apple

item.title: Well done, good and faithful servant
item.description: To you, commuter on the 6.15am bus who study on spinning wheels for an hour before a long day of work: Well done, good and faithful servant. To you, mother of small children who have wiped more noses and bottoms and floors than you could count:
